summary:
I have a passion for (organic) Chemistry and the various uses it has to benefit with the human life style. Over the years I have gained knowledge within (primarily) organic chemistry and chemical research (GLP standards maintained), have obtained a large variety of analytical chemistry skills and have worked within various research groups within Organic, Biobased and Polymer chemistry. Over the past years I have gotten increased interests within the life sciences sector and pharmaceutical drug research and I am always eager to learn more about chemistry.
Recently I've been working within the pharmaceutical branche, we're I've trained my skills within GMP/GDP, deviation-,SOP-,CAPA management and batch review for release of pharmaceutical products to the market.
